projects.name: Goscanner - Port scanner written in Go.
details: Developed with goroutines and channels to make it faster and more efficient.
Customizable options for the user to choose the port range, scan technique, etc.
Tech Stack: Golang, cobra, etc.

projects.name: MyIP - Terminal UI for network interface monitoring.
details: Developed a TUI tool that fetches and displays IP addresses in a clear, user-friendly format.
Addressed the pain point of confusing ifconfig and ipconfig outputs by simplifying network diagnostics.
Tech Stack: Rust, Ratatui, etc.

projects.name: CodingType - Web application for testing your coding speed.
details: Developed a web application for testing coding speed in multiple programming languages syntax.
Tracking the typing speed in real time and calculate the accuracy.
Tech Stack: Svelte.js, TailwindCSS, etc.

projects.name: Valentine Roses - Website for sending a roses card to your loved ones.
details: Developed a web application for sending roses to loved ones on Valentine's Day.
Design for privacy with a password protection to unlock the card.
Tech Stack: Next.js, TailwindCSS, Firebase, etc.

projects.name: Zigbrute - Password cracking tool.
details: Developed a tool for password cracking without knowing the hash type.
Cracking the password with a lot of techniques and algorithms to find the correct password.
Tech Stack: Zig, etc.

contributions.name: Lynx
details: Improve the .gitignore file to exclude auto generated files, particularly Gradle build artifacts.

contributions.name: (Co-Contributor) - Thai Bad Words
details: Refactor the whole data structure and algorithm for better searching performance.
Implement a unit test with Jest.
